sentence.Network_en: He was concious that it was politic.
sentence.Network_cn: 他意识到这是出于策略.

list.abs: 太多意识到自我（self-concious），总在想别人怎么看待我，女孩会怎么看我，女孩会不会讨厌我，我这样做女孩会不会反感... 男人 …

auth_sentence.content: Is the author implying the blind are not concious?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is the author implying the blind are not concious?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is the author implying the blind are not concious?

auth_sentence.content: We are concious before we enter our bodies.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are concious before we enter our bodies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are concious before we enter our bodies.

auth_sentence.content: Health concious people and social workers are trying to build the awareness and I am hopeful about that.
